p01_circular.title: Circular
p01_circular.description: Site-specific installation at Fraunhofer Institute for Interfacial Engineering and Biotechnology IGB Stuttgart. The work embodies a diverse and biobased economy (bioeconomy) by displaying different facets of scientific research in this field.
p01_circular.image-alt: A bright, gray installation made of metal and glass stands in a modern staircase. Several glass panels hang from thin steel cables in the installation. Brown, white and yellow bio-based materials are clamped into them.

p02_dika.title: Digitale Klasse Archive
p02_dika.keyword: Commission work in collaboration with Robert Schnüll
p02_dika.description: Interactive Data Sculpture visualising the archive of the Digitale Klasse at Berlin University of the Arts (UdK). To be released in early 2025.
p02_dika.image-alt: Picture of a laptop standing on a cluttered desk, showing a data visualisation on the screen.

p03_pi.title: Pi
p03_pi.description: Kinetic sculpture based on the noise of randomly distributed digits of pi. The noise appears as a seemingly inexhaustible well of non-periodic elements, setting the objects in motion.
p03_pi.image-alt: An installation stands in a bright, minimalist room. The installation consists of 10 black steel rods and 10 black rings. The elements of the installation are strung together and form a closed row.

p04_ion.title: Index of Noise
p04_ion.description: Ongoing artistic research project emerging from an eponymous work by Moritz Hundbiß and Robin Woern and Superposed Patterns by Niklas Thran.
p04_ion.image-alt: A technical drawing shows a three-dimensional Bloch sphere. The sphere contains ellipses and labels for the probability distribution. The drawing is in black and white and scanned.

p05_tabula-rasa.title: Tabula Rasa
p05_tabula-rasa.description: Data-driven video installation. Inspired by the philosophical concept of the clean slate, it explores the technology of Deep Reinforcement Learning in machine learning.
p05_tabula-rasa.image-alt: A video installation located in a large concrete room. It consists of a horizontal screen and shows a computer-generated, blue organism reminiscent of a cell.

p06_rn-generator.title: RN-Generator with Serial Interface
p06_rn-generator.description: Experimental device that deals with the generation of random numbers (RN) based on environmental influences for use in visual design and image generation.
p06_rn-generator.image-alt: A transparent box stands on a table next to a laptop. The background is gray and blurred. Blue lines can be seen on the screen of the laptop.
